resources.string:
This demo application was made for VELOXIY Company.
Using library and thecnologies : Retrofit, Picasso, Recyclerview, Data Binding.
Using Design Architecture : Mvvm. 
Using API : Twitter login api and rondom user api(randomuser.me)
 You can login with any twitter user. 
The application will show random users. If you click any user, you can see other details about this user .and additional when you go end of the list , application will add new random users.
